messages.content: Oxford East is my home. I won’t stand by and let it come to harm as a result of a more damaging years of Tory rule. Oxford deserves better than an extreme Tory Brexit, more division and more cuts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Campaigning to end the cuts to our schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Anneliese has been campaigning since she was elected in 2017 to end the cuts and for more and fairer funding for our schools.

Labour-run Oxford City Council is doing all it can to tackle rogue landlords and skyrocket rents. Labour will cap rent rises, launch the biggest council house-building programme in decades, and build a million new genuinely affordable homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Anneliese protects local NHS from privatisation
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Anneliese successfully campaigned to keep the Churchill Hospital's PET-CT cancer scanning service public and ensure it continues to be operated by the NHS rather than a private provider.

brexitEurope: A public vote on any Brexit Deal in which I will campaign to Remain as it is the best deal for Oxford and for Britain.
education: Children in our community are losing out because of savage Tory cuts to our schools. Our area will be £14.6 million worse off in 2020 than in 2015. Anneliese has been campaigning since she was elected in 2017 to end the cuts and for more and fairer funding for our schools.
Proper funding increases for Oxford's cash strapped schools, reduced class sizes for 5-7 year olds and scrap tuition fees.
environment: Real action to tackle the climate crisis and clean up our air and a Green New Deal creating over 400,000 new clean, green jobs.
health: Anneliese successfully campaigned to keep the Churchill Hospital's PET-CT cancer scanning service public and ensure it continues to be operated by the NHS rather than a private provider.
Increased funding for the NHS with more nurses and doctors to give patients the care they need.
Only Labour will protect our NHS from privatisation, invest in public services like our hospitals and schools, and create a more equal and compassionate society.
labourEmployment: A Real Living Wage of at least £10 an hour stronger workers' rights and real action on homelessness and rough sleeping.

community.content: Labour-run Oxford City Council is doing all it can to tackle rogue landlords and skyrocket rents. Labour will cap rent rises, launch the biggest council house-building programme in decades, and build a million new genuinely affordable homes.

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigning to end the cuts to our schools, Ending Oxford's Housing Crisis, Protecting local NHS from privatisation.

endorsements.endorsement: As a former primary school teacher for over 20 years, I know the damage the Tories and Lib Dems have done to our schools. That's why I will be backing Anneliese. This isn't about protecting my job. This is about my kids' education, and that is worth fighting for.
Only Labour will protect our NHS from privatisation, invest in public services like our hospitals and schools, and create a more equal and compassionate society.

images.caption: Anneliese Dodds, Labour & Co-operative candidate for Oxford East

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Anneliese lives locally in Rose Hill and is committed to putting Oxford first.
nonPolicyAttributes.family: Both her children were born in the JR and her son attends Rose Hill Primary.
